aircraft.value: Thunderhawk X-12 - AC-5847-691 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Ejector rack retention failure. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 23/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 24/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 24/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 27/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 01/07/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
